short_description_localized.en: Our premier location and this 200-square-foot room with two queen beds make the Hotel @ Fifth a great choice for families.
short_description_localized.es: Our premier location and this 200-square-foot room with two queen beds make the Hotel @ Fifth a great choice for families.

description_localized.en: At affordable rates and with two queen beds, the Superior Queen Queen room means a family vacation to New York City should be in the works. You’ll have 200 square feet of space, a comfortable bath, two queen beds, and daily continental breakfast so you don’t hit the streets hungry. Max. 4 guests.
description_localized.es: At affordable rates and with two queen beds, the Superior Queen Queen room means a family vacation to New York City should be in the works. You’ll have 200 square feet of space, a comfortable bath, two queen beds, and daily continental breakfast so you don’t hit the streets hungry. Max. 4 guests.
